title: Mini-Ep 50: Alone in a Crowd
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 50: Alone in a Crowd
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate hear from a listener who shares a life-changing New Year’s intention, offer nail care advice to a listener who’s been told she has “big cuticles," and swap tips on how to combat loneliness.We’re going to SXSW this year! Find more i...
description:
Doree and Kate hear from a listener who shares a life-changing New Year’s intention, offer nail care advice to a listener who’s been told she has “big cuticles," and swap tips on how to combat loneliness.

We’re going to SXSW this year! Find more info about our appearances here. RSVP for our March 10th Meet Up in Austin with Natch Beaut here.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • JustFab - Go to justfab.com/35 to sign up as a VIP and get your first JustFab style for as low as $10.
  • Poshmark - To get $5 off your first purchase on Poshmark, visit poshmark.com and use code DOREESHA.
  • Shine - To get 50% off a premium Shine membership and start getting daily motivational texts, visit shinetext.com/forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
